title: Manage Heap Leach Pad Operations
description: An operator at a gold mine manages the application of cyanide solution to a heap leach pad to dissolve the gold.

tasks.description: Check the solution application rate and cyanide concentration being pumped to the leach pad.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator confirms the current operating parameters are as per the plan.

tasks.description: Review the gold concentration in the pregnant leach solution (PLS) coming from the pad.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows the gold grade in the PLS is starting to decrease.

tasks.description: Decide to switch the solution application to a new, fresh area of the leach pad to maintain a high gold recovery rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator adjusts the irrigation system to start leaching a new cell of ore.
